entries.meaning: A West African storyteller who passes on oral traditions; a wandering musician and poet.
examples: Griots may be the chroniclers of an important family or of a group of people — like the Bambara hunters’ griot — or itinerant poets and musicians who extol the praises of the person who has hired them for a special festivity.

entries.meaning: (cooking) A Haitian dish of fried pork.
